title: RobotEnvelope
description: Standard envelope for all robot mode output. Every robot command returns data wrapped in this envelope, providing consistent metadata for agent consumption.

generated_at.description: When this output was generated (RFC3339 timestamp)

data.description: The actual data payload - schema depends on command

staleness.description: Data staleness by source (seconds since last collection)

warnings.description: Warnings about data quality or collection issues
examples: No collectors have run yet - data may be incomplete
